actions.name: Juiced Fruit

cost.trigger: The user consumes a Berry based [Food] item.

actions.description:
Trigger: The user consumes a Berry based [Food] item.

Effect: The user recovers 6 Ticks of HP and gains +1 SPD Stage for 5 Activations.
